name: denim
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
B2 a thick, strong cotton cloth, often blue in colour, used especially for making jeans: a denim jacket and jeans
Kuzma/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages denims UK informal
clothes, especially jeans, made of denim: He's usually in denims.
See more
More examplesFewer examplesShe was wearing a fringed denim skirt.Leather is very much in fashion this season, as is denim.
